We are hiring for lots of different positions. Software Engineers, Data Scientist and more. We're looking for very senior iOS and Android engineers to lead our teams.

Our autonomous devision is hiring at a rapid rate. If you have experience in deep learning or hardware engineering we need you for this.

Please email me at me@azimi.me for more information
